entities.name: centaur
entities.description: The Centaur is mentioned as a creature that Firenze cares for.

entities.name: sneak
entities.description: The Sneak is mentioned as a creature that Firenze cares for.

entities.name: firenze
entities.description: Firenze is a centaur who cares for magical creatures and has a secret that Harry Potter must deliver to Hagrid.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the one who receives the message from Firenze and delivers it to Hagrid.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is a human who continues attending Care of Magical Creatures lessons.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is the gamekeeper at Hogwarts and receives the message from Harry Potter.

relationships.description: Firenze cares for magical creatures, including centaurs.
Harry Potter delivers Firenze's message to Hagrid.
Harry Potter delivers Firenze's message to Hagrid.
Umbridge continues attending Care of Magical Creatures lessons.
Hagrid receives Firenze's message from Harry Potter.
